author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Michael Mann’s 1995 crime drama Heat has been considered one of his greatest cinematic achievements. In 2022, he followed up the film with a novel titled Heat 2. Soon after, plans for a feature film adaptation were announced, though it looks like Heat 2 is now facing pushback from Warner Bros. This is unfortunate news [...]

The post Michael Mann’s ‘Heat 2’ Faces Pushback From WB appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Michael Mann’s ‘Heat 2’ Faces Pushback From WB

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
One of the most anticipated sequel projects in Hollywood is the follow-up to Mel Gibson’s The Passion of the Christ. Gibson is set to return as director for the sequel to his 2004 biblical epic which became the highest-grossing R-rated film of all time for decades at the domestic box office until the release of [...]

The post Mel Gibson’s ‘Passion Of The Christ’ Sequel Split Into Two Movies appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Mel Gibson’s ‘Passion Of The Christ’ Sequel Split Into Two Movies
